name: CloudWatchMetricDimensionPropertyType
description: The Metric Dimension is an embedded property of the AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm type. Dimensions are arbitrary name/value pairs that can be associated with a CloudWatch metric. You can specify a maximum of 10 dimensions for a given metric.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the dimension, from 1–255 characters in length.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value representing the dimension measurement, from 1–255 characters in length.
